DOC.brief_summary: Primary Specific Aim 1 : To compare dose-responsive effect vitamin D3 supplementation 25 ( OH ) D , parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) , serum/urine calcium . Primary Specific Aim 2 : To compare dose-responsive effect vitamin D3 supplementation non-invasive vascular measure include pulse wave velocity ( PWV ) , flow-mediated dilation ( FMD ) , carotid arterial compliance ( CAC ) , carotid Intima-Media Thickness ( cIMT ) , 24-hours Ambulatory Blood Pressure ( ABP ) monitoring well casual BP .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Supplementation Overweight/Obese African American Adults Youth ( D-SUNNY )
DOC.criteria: 1 . AfricanAmericans ( black ) 2 . Age 1345 3 . Overweight/obese ( BMI ≥ 85th percentile age gender age 1317 BMI ≥ 25 kg/m2 age 1845 ) 4 . Relatively healthy ( medical history heart , lung , endocrine malignant disorder ) 5 . Non pregnant 6 . Not medication vitamin supplement influence study outcomes 7 . Serum 25 hydroxy Vitamin D ( 25 [ OH ] D ) level ≤ 20 ng/ml ( 50 nmol/L ) time screen 1 . Not meet one criterion 2 . Females become pregnant/test positive urine pregnancy test screen test visit 3 . Anyone take multivitamin supplement contain vitamin D
